What if you were going to be infected with a deadly disease. You have no choice in the matter it is was going to happen no matter what. You were then given a choice of which deadly disease you were to be infected with. You have to choose and if you don't choose you will be infected by the most popular. Which one do you choose?

Bubonic plague was deadly 500 years ago. 
 Very easy to cure now with oral antibiotics.
 So that's what I would choose.
I'm assuming we're talking about a resistant strain of plague.
does America have universal health care in this hypothetical scenario?
